website_summaries.verdict: Anarchy Reigns' tight combat and over-the-top action are brilliant in places, but tiresome in others.
pros: Satisfying combat systemFabulously gory combosChopping the head off a giant squid with a chainsaw
cons: Difficult to follow the storySome single-player missions get repetitiveBig online brawls don't work as well as smaller ones

customer_reviews.title: I love this game first of all
customer_reviews.text: I love this game first of all. Deep story, 2 sides playable. And when you beat the story you can go back and play it as many characters with different skin/costume options. I love the combat, love the characters, the story was awesome, overall it's great in my opinion. I haven't beaten it on hardest difficulty yet but that'll be next!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Sims

customer_reviews.title: Short campaign, but always fun.
customer_reviews.text: Short campaign but really fun and amazing soundtrack. Deserves a remaster got like $30.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Try it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't quite enjoy the game like I thought I would. I guess since I played it so many years after it came out. I'm so used to new games now, that I'm spoiled.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good beat em up
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good beat em up. Does get repetitive and you have to pretty much beat it twice to complete it, once with each character. Maybe with slightly different challenges but very similiar. The combat and moves are pretty good though. Looks like a game that couldve been very good with more polish, but its somewhat enjoyable as it is.
customer_reviews.author: game collector

customer_reviews.title: Anarchy reigns shortly.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this game. Something about it just didn't feel fun. I think it might have been the fact that out of all the bizarre characters, you can only play two of them...
customer_reviews.author: Chris J. Ruglund

customer_reviews.title: Mediocrity Reigns.
customer_reviews.text: I love Platinum Games but this is boring and repetitive. You can beat this game mashing the X button. :P
customer_reviews.author: CollegeStudentJJL

customer_reviews.title: Really fun game!
customer_reviews.text: The campaign can kind of be repetitive, but overall great action! I also love the gorier side of things this game offers!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: a must play online
customer_reviews.text: this game is all about the online thats where you will get the best out of this game many different game types to keep you playing for a long while
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: fun beat em up
customer_reviews.text: great game if you want to just beat up guys and have some fun. gets real boring after a while so you might wanna play in small doses
customer_reviews.author: P. D. Kim

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for under $10
customer_reviews.text: Another Great Game that I paid under $10 bucks for. It's made by Platinum Games that made the original Bayonetta. IF you liked that game, you'll probably like this.
customer_reviews.author: TC Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great story and great gameplay, just wished that it was 2 player
customer_reviews.author: Justin Horner

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The game was for my 19 year old. He was happy with the game. He has already beat the game; so he may sold it to Gamestop.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: It's good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: If you like beat 'em ups with variety, give this a try. If you liked Madworld, you'll enjoy seeing the characters in a new light. If you're an underground rap fan, pick this game up. If you thought Super Smash Bros. chaos was fun but were turned off by the lack of blood or the rarity of map-level events, you will like this game. If all of this sounds like a chore, avoid it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Clemmer

customer_reviews.title: It's fun
customer_reviews.text: The game is fun when your playing with alot of friends which is unlikely since not many people bought this game. Before you play online make sure you learn some combos/infinites because if not it's pretty much gonna be rage fest for you and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Farrad Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Just in time
customer_reviews.text: My brother loves it. He had no idea it was coming.... Thanks will be back to do business again! Just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Shaolin

customer_reviews.title: A different kind of game.
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up on a whim and really have enjoyed it. Its not the best game nor the worst. If you are in the mood for something different, pick up this budget title.
customer_reviews.author: GoodPoizon

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Will know more at Christmas, but believe grandchildren will get enjoyment out of this game.
customer_reviews.author: 3feathers

customer_reviews.title: Have the right expectations going in.
customer_reviews.text: This game is great at what it is. Huge over the top action and combo beat 'em up. The multi-player is cool but the game does get pretty repetitive. So if your looking for a fast pace-button masher- beat'em up this games for you. If you're looking for some depth and longevity this is not that. It is good at what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Nate C

customer_reviews.title: the stars pretty much sum it up
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. I like the ridiculous over the top kills and multiplayer was pretty cool, but it tries too hard to have a story when it shouldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Dis Gruntled

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this game. It brings me back to the days of Phantom Dust on the regular xbox. Its very fun and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: mine
customer_reviews.text: alright for a fighting game just not for everyone not enough story for the story mode get repetitive fast and doesn't stop
customer_reviews.author: josh hensley

customer_reviews.title: Good Platinum Game, but no the best
customer_reviews.text: For a game that puts so much effort for the multiplayer, it's just ok. Single player is very basic. Worth a try if you like Platinum Games.
customer_reviews.author: Silvio Carrera

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: despite not getting the limited edition version as I was hoping for I still love to play this game for the fun challenges it offers
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great, but only in multiplayer
customer_reviews.text: It's unfortunate; I really wanted to like this game more. The player vs player aspect of the game is incredibly fun. The solo campaign is unrelieved, unbearable tedium even for me, a fan of the Dynasty Warriors franchise. If I could give half star ratings, this would have gotten 2.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Himitsu

customer_reviews.title: Go game. You do the same thing over and over. Online play is fun, lots of different game types to play.
customer_reviews.text: Solid game, story mode is kind of boring. Online game play is what you will be buying this for. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jesse thomas jr.

customer_reviews.title: I was talked into buying this game by some friends
customer_reviews.text: It was a mistake, it's repetitive and boring. The story's not half bad and the characters are ok, but the game play is pretty weak.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: This game is...just...terrible. Bad music, weak graphics, ridiculous voice acting, bad combat, and the story is, well, stupid. If you spend more than a dollar on this game, you'd be getting ripped off. I take that back, you'd still be getting ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Evildead11

customer_reviews.title: Fun, and upbeat!
customer_reviews.text: I had heard of this game through a friend, and I ended up pre-ordering it because as a pre-order bonus you got DLC code to play as Bayonetta (on my favorite games) and that's what had sold me on the game! The multiplayer is INTENSE and action packed with lots of characters and skills to unlock! The Soundtrack is very fun and upbeat! This was a super popular title and multiplayer was so packed you couldn't find a game type to join, but now its hard to find a lot of people to play multiplayer with. I really enjoy the game and as an alternative Anarchy Reigns does offer a campaign to play as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mik

customer_reviews.title: it's really bad. I thought because this was a fighting game ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this for story mode, it's really bad. I thought because this was a fighting game you could fight each other 2 player versus at home together but you can only fight someone online. So now in 2016 I don't think anyone online will still be playing.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Does most right.
customer_reviews.text: This does some cardinal sins of action games, such as running at thirty frames per second. But there's a lot to appreciate of the game and It has a great atmosphere. Bayonetta even makes a cameo in it, how cool!
customer_reviews.author: Alec Schindler

product_meta.title: Anarchy Reigns - Xbox 360
product_meta.description:
Platform:Xbox 360SET IN THE POST-APOCALYPTIC FUTURE, THIS IS AN OVER-THE-TOP CL OSECOMBAT FIGHTING GAME, SET IN A MASSIVELY OPEN AND FANTASTICAL WORLD. PICK FROM AN IMAGINATIVE MIX OF HUMAN AND CYBORG CHARACTERS AND SET OUT ON A MULTIPLAYER CHALLENGE WHERE ANA RCHY REIGNS.WITH A DIVERSE RANGE OF MULTIPLAYER MODES ON OFFER,

AMAZON.COM




 Here you are, in the post-apocalyptic future in a massively open and fantastical world. With cyborgs and humans living amongst one another, the power struggle is intense when both have the same goal — to be the ultimate survivor. Do you have what it takes to come out on top in a survival of the fittest? 





Multiplayer Mayhem



Variety of Multiplayer modes



Open fantastic world

SYNOPSIS
 Take on the roles of imaginative human and cyborg characters in over-the-top close combat in Anarchy Reigns. Master each of the eight character's unique style, weapon and signature kill move to become the ultimate survivor. Take cover as Action Trigger Events provide a constantly changing gameplay environment with real-time events such as The Black Hole, a plane crash and blitz bombing. Challenge your friends in multiplayer modes, including Battle Royale, Deathmatch and Survival mode. Play as Jack or Leo in the single-player Campaign mode in the ultimate survival of the fittest. Immerse yourself in the violence and combat of the post-apocalyptic future whereAnarchy Reigns. 



KEY FEATURES:
 * Multiplayer mayhem - Creativity and violence are rewarded in this online brawler, as you battle to become the ultimate survivor. With over 8 different characters to choose from, each with their own unique style, weapon, and signature kill move, this is the ultimate survival of the fittest.
 * Various modes - ANARCHY REIGNS provides a variety of multiplayer modes to cater for different tastes. The list of modes includes Battle Royale, Death Match, Survival Mode and many more.
 * Single-player, two characters - Play either as Jack or Leo in the ultimate ‘survival of the fittest’. In true PlatinumGames form, each character brings a unique style and feel to the single-player Campaign mode, providing over 10 hours of gameplay.
 * Action trigger events - A.T.E. (Action Trigger Events) system triggers real-time events such as The Black Hole, a plane crash, blitz bombing etc to provide a constantly changing gameplay environment. No two matches will ever be the same.
feature_bullets: Multiplayer mayhem - Creativity and violence are rewarded in this online brawler, as you battle to become the ultimate survivor. With over 8 different characters to choose from, each with their own unique style, weapon, and signature kill move, this is the ultimate survival of the fittest
Various modes - ANARCHY REIGNS provides a variety of multiplayer modes to cater for different tastes. The list of modes includes Battle Royale, Death Match, Survival Mode and many more

Single-player, two characters - Play either as Jack or Leo in the ultimate survival of the fittest'. In true PlatinumGames form, each character brings a unique style and feel to the single-player Campaign mode, providing over 10 hours of game play

Action trigger events - A.T.E. (Action Trigger Events) system triggers real-time events such as The Black Hole, a plane crash, blitz bombing etc to provide a constantly changing game play environment. No two matches will ever be the same
